entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
